channel.title: Web Developer
channel.description: It's my personal site, what else do you want to know?

item.title: Moved site to GitHub
item.description: Because I'm tired of GoDaddy - Alright, so I decided to finally move all of my stuff from GoDaddy hosting over to GitHub pages. At the base price for their service I was looking at around $111 a year. That’s the lowest tier they have. That’s obviously not horrible for an email address, some hosting, and...
